arccos: Returns the inverse cosine of x, in that if cos(val)=n, arccos(n)=val, and the resulting number will be between pi and 0.
NOTE:This will only accept a number between -1 and 1 (anything else will throw an error).
NOTE: This function takes a value in radians, not degrees.
The angle (in radians) to return the inverse cosine of.
This will set val to pi/2.
